thread.title: Modern Promos Promotes Karen Walne to Vice President of Client Services

author: cnbc.com
title: Modern Promos Promotes Karen Walne to Vice President of Client Services
text:
MINNEAPOLIS, Feb. 21, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Modern Promos is pleased to announce that the full-service brand activation agency has promoted Karen Walne to vice president of client services. Karen has served as director of client services since she joined the team in May 2017.
"Karen has been a tremendous asset to our team from the moment she stepped through the door," says Jonathon Nelson, president of Modern Promos. "She's raised the bar for the entire client services team and been instrumental in the growth of our business, and we look forward to her continued contributions in this new role."
With more than 20 years of experience in marketing and operations, Karen brings an extensive background of client service to the Modern Promos team. She has a proven track record with clients across a wide variety of organizations and industries, including Fortune 500 companies, and her experience includes experiential marketing, event production, social media, business development and more.
"My timing was perfect with coming on board just in time to develop programs for our clients activating around the Super Bowl," says Karen. "I have worked with Super Bowl promotions in the past, but watching it take shape in our backyard was a highlight of my first year on the Modern Promos team."
Karen will utilize her passion for experiential marketing to continue developing innovative and impactful brand experiences for Modern Promos' clients. Her creativity and marketing mindset are perfectly balanced by her extensive background in operations and logistics, keeping the big picture front-and-center throughout each project while ensuring each and every detail is squared away.
Karen fuels her passion for experiential participation by frequently volunteering and traveling. With family spread from Australia to the U.K., she is often exposed to new experiences that can translate into new ideas for her work. Karen regularly volunteers in her children's school and in her local community, as well, and often finds the best professional ideas come to her in the places she'd least expect.
Modern Promos was recently named to Chief Marketer's list of top 200 engagement and activation agencies in the U.S. The team's growth and capabilities is catching the eye of many decision makers and key influencers, and Karen's contributions to the team have had a major impact on the team's overall success this year.
About Modern Promos
Modern Promos is one of the nation's top brand activation agencies and has worked with hundreds of North America's biggest brands. As a full-service brand activation agency specializing in impactful brand experiences, Modern Promos partners both directly with brands and with advertising, public relations and marketing agencies. We create effective and efficient experiential campaigns that bring brands to life while leaving a lasting impression on consumers. With a nationwide network of more than 35,000 brand ambassadors, Modern Promos has the knowledge and staff to produce and execute immersive, impactful, creative brand experiences. Learn more at www.modernpromos.com .
